name: TheHarvardGazette
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
The Harvard Gazette offers you official news from Harvard University, covering discovery and innovation in teaching, learning, and research. 

Add this skill as a part of your flash briefing to hear headlines and excerpts from the latest Gazette stories in arts & humanities, campus & community, health & medicine, national & world affairs, and science & technology. 

To get started, “enable The Harvard Gazette” and then you can ask "Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?" or "Alexa, what's in the news?" You can manage and change the order of your flash briefing skills under "Settings > Flash Briefing" in the Alexa app.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
